title: Calories in a Cornbread Muffin
meta_description: Discover calories in cornbread muffin, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard medium-sized cornbread muffin (~50 g), made from mix with cornmeal, flour, milk, egg, and butter; baked, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand, size, and ingredients like added sugar or oil. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cornbread muffin has about 200 kcal, with 28 g carbs and 4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in cornbread muffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 200 kcal for one standard medium muffin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cornbread muffin?
faqs.a: About 28 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 5 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is cornbread muffin high in protein?
faqs.a: No, it has around 4 g protein per muffin; it's more carb-focused.

faqs.q: How does sodium in cornbread muffin compare?
faqs.a: Typically 300 mg per muffin, varying by recipe and added salt.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie cornbread muffin?
faqs.a: Yes, use less butter or oil, or opt for a low-fat recipe to reduce to ~150 kcal.
